message: I'm excited to offer you the product for $12,000. I think it's a great value, and I'm confident you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but $12,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time. I'm happy to pay $9,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. I can do $11,000, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $11,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $10,000, which is a fair price for both of us.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. I can meet you at $10,500, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings to you.
